original_title: UFC Fight Night 83: Cowboy vs. Cowboy
overview: UFC Fight Night 83: Cowboy vs. Cowboy was a mixed martial arts event held on February 21, 2016, at the Consol Energy Center in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The event was headlined by a welterweight bout between former UFC Lightweight Championship challenger Donald Cerrone and Alex Oliveira.
title: UFC Fight Night 83: Cowboy vs. Cowboy
